item.title: CVE-2024-21738|2024-08-01T22:27:35.894Z -- sap_se -- sap%20netweaver%20abap%20application%20server%20and%20abap%20platform
item.description: SAP NetWeaver ABAP Application Server and ABAP Platform do not sufficiently encode user-controlled inputs, resulting in Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability.Â An attacker with low privileges can cause limited impact to confidentiality of the application data after successful exploitation.
